title: Authenticated ->Condensed-> Playback
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the App from ROKU Channel store. https://channelstore.roku.com/browse
2. Should not be a Blackout game
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User clicks * button or the Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3. Navigate and select the Scores option
4. Click on Scores page
5. Click on a LIVE game tile
6. Click on Condensed option
custom_expected: Video streaming should start playing

title: Authenticated ->Condensed -> Free game -> Playback
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the App from ROKU Channel store. https://channelstore.roku.com/browse
2. User should Login with a valid account
3. Should not be a Blackout game
custom_steps:
1.User launches the MLB App
2.User clicks * button or the Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3.Navigate and select the Scores option
4.Click on Scores tab
5.User navigates and click the Game tiles->Free Game of the Day tile
6. User clicks on Condensed option
custom_expected: Video streaming should start and video playback should start playing

title: Authenticated ->Condensed-> Verify that after the Condensed Video ends, user returns to the Feed Selection Screen
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the App from ROKU Channel store. https://channelstore.roku.com/browse 
2. Should not be a Blackout game
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User clicks * button or the Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu 3. Navigate and select the Scores option
4. Click on Scores page
5. Click on a LIVE game tile
6. Click on Condensed option
7. Play the video till the end
custom_expected: THEN after the video ends it should navigates back to Feed selection screen.

title: Authenticated->Playback-> User selects Resume
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the App from ROKU Channel store. https://channelstore.roku.com/browse

2. User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User clicks * button or the Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3. Navigate and select the Scores option
4. Click on Scores page
5. Click on a LIVE/Free game tile
6. User selects playable Archive game content
7. User selects the Home or Away feed
8. User plays the asset for few mins.
WHEN the user returns to the previously watched game
AND attempts to watch it again
AND presses the Resume option
custom_expected: THEN the video stream will continue where the user left off

title: Authenticated-> User selects Start from beginning
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the App from ROKU Channel store. https://channelstore.roku.com/browse

2. User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User clicks * button or the Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3. Navigate and select the Scores option
4. Click on Scores page
5. User selects LIVE/Free /VOD game tile
6. User selects the Home or Away feed

AND chooses the option to Watch

AND selects 'Start from beginning
custom_expected:
THEN the video playback will launch

AND the stream will restart at the beginning

title: Authenticated ->Feed Select -> Verify Innings are updating correctly in the Feed Select Screen*
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the App from ROKU Channel store. https://channelstore.roku.com/browse
2. Login with the Valid account
3. User should navigate to Home/Standings/Scores
custom_steps: When the game is In Progress
custom_expected: Then the innings should be updating correctly

title: Authenticated-> Video Playback-> <</>> buttons Rewind/Fast-Forward buttons on the remote
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the App from ROKU Channel store. https://channelstore.roku.com/browse 
2. Should not be a Blackout game
3. User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User clicks * button or the Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3. Navigate and select the Scores/Video option
4. WHEN the user launches playable content AND attempts to press the FFW or REW button on the remote
custom_expected: THEN the FFW or REW buttons are usable and they function as expected (during playback pressing the FFW or REW buttons Fast Forwards or Rewinds the content) without issue

title: Authenticated -> Playback -> CC -> Verify that Closed Captioning
custom_preconds:
User should download the App from ROKU Channel store. https://channelstore.roku.com/browse
User should login with the Valid credentials
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. User clicks * button or the Back button on the Remote to invoke the Left Menu
3. Navigate and select the Scores 

WHEN we access any VOD archive content 
AND we begin playback
custom_expected:
THEN we will be able to successfully enable Closed Captioning 
AND we will be able to successfully disable Closed Captioning
Note: Not all VOD content have a source with Closed Captioning. If you do not have CC on the VOD game you selected please check other VOD to pass this Test.
